    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BaseCommander
    Class to handle various basic commands.
    BaseCommands
    List of parsable basic framework commands.
    Batch
     
    CacheCollection
     
    Column
    Defines a database ColumnInterface for a field if their names differ.
    ColumnInterface
    Represents the database column instance.
    ColumnInterface.Functions
     
    ColumnsComparisonInterface
    Used to pair columns with values in different query parts.
    ColumnSetValueComparison
    Pairing column with value for SET in UPDATE statement.
    ColumnsMap
    Use this builder to create a map of fields to columns if they have different names.
    ColumnsMapping
    Defines a ColumnsMap which is used to translate object's fields to ColumnInterface.
    ColumnToColumnComparison
     
    ColumnToValueComparison
    Pairing column with values for different data comparisons in WHERE clauses.
    CommanderInterface
    To read commands from outside of app, use CommanderInterface.readCommandsFromTextFile(File), which can be scheduled with your flow manager.
    CommanderInterface.EnclosingType
     
    CommandInterface
    Command used by CommanderInterface or BaseCommander.
    ComparisonOperator
     
    ConditionalDelimiter
     
    ConnectionPool
    Hikari Connection Pool wrapper implementation.
    ConnectionPoolInterface
    If implemented, QueryExecutorInterface will use it to load connections.
    ConsoleProgress
     
    ConsoleProgress.Position
     
    ConsoleRenderable
     
    ConsoleRenderable.Position
     
    CountableMappingInterface
     
    CSV
     
    DBCDriverInterface
    Driver used to establish database connections.
    DBCDrivers
    Default implementations of standard DBC drivers.
    DefaultProviders
    Default providers.
    DeleteStatement
     
    Entity
    A subject for persistence.
    ExecutionType
     
    Filter
    Defines a method returning Function<SelectStatement, WhereClause> modifying @Loader statement (either generic or custom).
    FlowControl
     
    FlowControlInterface
     
    FlowInterface
    Access point for FlowControlInterface.
    Flows
    Wrapper around default flows, for which each the Phaser is created, within FlowControl initialization.
    Fresh
    Prevent usage of PersistenceMemory for this class.
    GroupByInterface
     
    GroupByStatement
     
    Incremental
    Marks field that is auto-incremented within database, thus won't take part in "values" keyword in persistence queries.
    Inserter
    Method that returns Query which is used as the explicit statement during insert execution.
    InsertStatement
     
    jfxApp
    Base container of JavaFX application and utilities.
    JoinTypes
    For SELF JOIN use TableInterface.joinSelf(String, String, String...).
    Key
    Marks fields that will be used as keys in persistence executions.
    KrystalFramework
    Launching from main() proposed flow: Set framework properties (variables, pre-loads, etc
    KrystalFramework.DefaultImplementation
    List of default implementations available for core interfaces in the framework.
    KrystalServlet
    Builder of asynchronous (non-blocking) HttpServlet, utilising Virtual Threads.
    KrystalServlet.BeforeAndAfter
     
    KrystalServlet.KrystalServletBuilder
     
    Loader
    Defines a custom SelectStatement to load the object with.
    LoggingInterface
    Convenient way to access Logger from interfaces.
    LoggingWrapper
    Simple logging wrapper around log4j.
    Memorized
    The PersistenceMemory will hold objects of this class infinitely unless explicitly cleared.
    NativeConsoleReader
    The process manager to read commands from native console input (System.in).
    OrderByDeclaration
     
    OrderByDirection
     
    OrderByInterface
     
    OrderByKeyword
     
    Persistence
    Retrieval operations on Entity objects.
    PersistenceCache
    Abstract class for creating and managing custom caches (Collections and Maps) of PersistenceInterface objects.
    PersistenceCache.DefaultCacheTask
     
    PersistenceExecutions
     
    PersistenceFilters
     
    PersistenceInterface
    TODO JDoc :)
    PersistenceMappingInterface
     
    PersistenceMemory
    Each PersistenceInterface object loaded are saved in memory for quick access.
    PropertiesAndArguments
    Default properties and arguments.
    PropertiesInterface
    Interface to manage properties and cmd-line arguments.
    Provider
    Defines a ProviderInterface used for database operations.
    ProviderInterface
    Each provider references different database connector.
    Q
    Quick factory for basic Query abstractions.
    Query
    Base for all SQL related operations.
    QueryExecutionInterface
     
    QueryExecutor
    Basic settings and operations on databases
    QueryExecutorInterface
    Doing the dirty job of connecting through database drivers and processing the ResultSet into maintainable QueryResultInterface.
    QueryExecutorInterface.MandatoryProperties
    Mandatory properties to be set within "provider_name.properties".
    QueryResult
    Parses and stores the ResultSet data.
    QueryResult.ResultSetProcessingException
     
    QueryResultInterface
    Rows and columns loaded from database.
    QueryType
     
    Reader
    Marks constructor used to parse data from QueryResultInterface, or void methods run after the constructor.
    ReadOnly
    Mark Class that is read-only, which basically permits all-except-writing operations.
    Remover
    Method returning Query which is used as the explicit statement during PersistenceInterface.delete() execution.
    ScheduledTaskInterface
     
    SelectStatement
     
    SeparateKeys
    If applied, the presence of any @Key field passes the key presence check for persistence operation.
    StatementModifiers
    Basic SQL statement modifiers builder and holder.
    Table
    Defines a database TableInterface for a Entity class.
    TableInterface
    Represents the database table instance.
    TasksSchedulerInterface
     
    TomcatFactory
    Use TomcatFactory.buildServer(TomcatProperties) to create embedded Tomcat implementation.
    TomcatProperties
    Define properties through convenient
    invalid reference 
    TomcatProperties#builder()
    method.
    Updater
    Method that returns Query which is used as the explicit statement during update execution.
    UpdateStatement
     
    ValuesFilter
     
    ValuesOrder
     
    Vertical
    By default, each row of declared persitence table, represents a single persisted object.
    Vertical.PivotColumn
    Static return of ColumnInterface of PersistenceInterface.getTable() that describes fields names.
    Vertical.UnpivotToColumns
    Optional static return of List of ColumnInterface that the underlying query will be un-pivoted into.
    Vertical.ValuesColumn
    Static return of ColumnInterface of PersistenceInterface.getTable() that describes fields values.
    WhereClause
     
    WhereClauseDelimiter
     
    WhereClauseInnerBlock
     
    WhereClauseInterface
     
    WhereClauseOuterBlock
     
    Writer
    Use to mark methods that are writers - mapping methods for fields to return desired values and types when saving to the database.
